name: Searching for a Payment using matching criteria

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930020222000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I search for a payment using search details:
| regNum | pageSize | pageNumber |
| 00000002 | 1 | 1 |

Then I should recieve the following payments:
| amount | appId | bic | createDate | creditBban | creditIban | creditName | currency | debitBban | debitIban | debitName | exeDate | pId | recordType | regNum | status | statusDate |
| 1 | Agent | BOFIIE20 | 2014-02-20T14:15:11.000 | 90153899943016 | IE46BOFI90153899943016 | BOI VISA | EUR | 93101200805061 | IE47AIBK93101200805061 | VIOLET EURO | 2014-02-20T00:00:00.000 | 0BUTDGM68H6AH402 | PaymentBill | 00000002 | PROCESSED | 2014-02-20T14:15:12.000 |

title: Searching for a Payment using matching criteria
